review: Great graphics also pretty hard to take care alone here some tips to survive and win the games.1. Teamwork.2. Don't wasted ammo and use your stuff on right time.3. Don't too close with alien because they can hit you from bit longer distance and make 2x hit if I remember and don't rush too much.That only i know.
Interesting games and fun to play.
